amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase metropolitan medical response team funding by $14.7 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) for training, exercises, technical assistance, and other programs by $14,700,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 224 (Roll no. 218).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Markey.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
